data: Fire multiple rays that deal nonlethal force.
Flying storm cloud deals 3d6 electricity damage.
Flying storm cloud deals 6d6 electricity damage.
Pain encourages an outsider to obey you.
Blast of air deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage and knocks opponent upward.
Gain +5 armor bonus to your AC, natural attacks are good and silver, and infuse your breath weapon with holy power.
Aura penalizes enemy attacks and AC.
Paralyze all creatures in the area with the sound of a booming trumpet.
The power of conviction assaults neutral foes
Harm and possibly daze chaotic creatures.
Create a wall of faintly shimmering elemental energy; this can be configured to allow ranged weapons to pass through it in one direction.
Flying balls of lightning deal 3d6 electricity damage each.
Hurl a fist sized ball of force to damage your enemy and knock them back.
Cursed object highlights creatures that attempt to take it.
Grant the target the effects of a planar infusion
Grants the target the benefits of an improved planar infusion
Grants the target the benefits of a greater planar infusion
Strike down creatures who thought you were their friend
Gain a pool of luck that can be used to add a luck bonus to any d20 rolls, which can turn a failure into a success
Deal 1d6+Str or Cha to target by speaking at it
Create an area of total darkness.
Kills, paralyzes, weakens, or dazes nonevil subjects.
As gust of wind, treater creatures in the area as smaller than they are for the effects of the wind
Create bow with brilliant energy arrows or a bridge that helps allies and hinders opponents.
Fire blinding rays of sunlight to blind enemies and damage those with sensitivity to light.
Make an Intimidate check against all foes within 30 feet; those demoralized also take fire damage.
Unarmed strikes create crows that deal fire and negative energy damage.
Sacrifice your own blood to imbue others with spell-like abilities.
Retry attack or check, but do worse on next two.
As daylight, but lasts longer and can dispel darkness effects
Take best of two d20 rolls.
Scour the life in an area, especially Abyssal life.
Fire an arc of flame from your fingers which bounces from target to target.
As entangle, but deals fire damage and obscures the area with smoke
Inflict 1d6 fire damage to creature by looking at it.
Emit a blast of force to damage and knock creatures prone
Fill the area with a blinding light.
Fill the target with powerful and damaging light.
Your bombs create a cage of force that traps creatures inside the bomb's splash radius.
Calls down lightning bolts (3d6 per bolt) from sky.
As call lightning, but 5d6 damage per bolt.
Surround yourself with an aura of nothingness.
Creates a shelter around a campfire.
Creates a floating chain of force.
As chain lightning but with fire damage, albeit at a shorter range.
Fuel a target's spellcasting, spontaneously cast spells without expending the slot.
Harms and slows lawful creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).
As heal, but only cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +25).
Create a ring of fire that damages creatures passing through and dispels evil magic within
Large hand provides cover, pushes, or attacks your foes.
Cone of ice slivers deals 1d6 cold/level.
Fills area with positive energy, weakening undead.
Ask eldritch entities to find and converse with you
Ask more powerful entities to find and converse with you
Ask very powerful eldritch entities to find and converse with you, or they may reply telepathically.
Ask extraordinarily powerful eldritch entities to find and converse with you, or they may reply telepathically.
Scorching rays cause 4d6 fire damage, then move on to new targets.
Sets trigger condition for another spell.
Set the condition for triggering a target's readied standard, move, or swift action.
Transfer a scroll's power to the target; the scroll is then triggered as contingency.
As fireball, but secretly deals less damage to your allies.
Attack a creature with cosmic energy.
Sheet of ice slowly spreads outward on a horizontal surface.
Large hand provides cover, pushes, or crushes your foes.
Curse an area with eternal night
Punish creatures for evil spells they know or that affect them
Create four spheres of floating darkness.
Create a dazzling light that only affects those without light sensitivity.
Create an arrow of crackling electricity to harm your enemies or alert your allies.
Set one of a list of contingencies for your demise.
Blast of song deals 3d10 damage and deafens targets.
Turn a critical hit into a decapitation.
Object sheds supernatural shadow in 60-ft. radius.
1d6/level fire damage; you can postpone blast for up to 5 rounds.
Fills area with negative energy, making undead stronger.
Inflicts 1d8/level energy damage to all creatures within 15 ft.
Fire a cone of slivers that deal 1d6 damage/level and bypass adamantine and cold iron DR.
Kills, paralyzes, staggers, or deafens nonlawful targets.
3d6 sonic damage in 10-ft. burst or 30-ft. cone can also bull rush creatures.
Object touched emanates bright light, granting Perception and Sense Motive bonuses.
Noise makes it difficult to cast.
You gain +1 per three levels on attack and damage rolls.
You gain attack bonuses and 1 hp/level.
Magical rain dampens fire but amplfies electricity
Subject can absorb energy damage and enhance melee attacks with it.
Gives you a dragon's breath weapon.
Harm and possibly sicken good creatures.
Deal sonic damage and daze target.
Deal 6d6 points of damage and entangle creatures in a 30-ft. radius, and push ethereal and incorporeal creatures onto the Material Plane.
Draw forth a ghostly, animated ectoplasmic hand to do your bidding.
Tendril of ectoplasm grapples a creature and tethers you to it.
Shoot a ray made up of multiple energies at your enemy.
Creates an aura of energy around you.
Create a quick hemispherical wall of force to protect you from falling debris.
Fill an area with invisible shards that slow movement and damage creatures.
Explode the head of a creature with 20 hp or fewer and deal damage in a 10-ft. radius around it.
Alter creature's buoyancy so that it swiftly rises to the surface
Outlines subjects with light, canceling blur, concealment, and the like.
Charge a weapon with magical fiery runes.
Cause a summoned creature to explode.
Exhale a cone of flame at will.
Your ability to smite evil also entangles your foe.
Smited creature takes damage when it attacks.
Creatures attacking you take fire damage; you're protected from heat or cold.
Creates a serpentine path of fire 5 ft. long/level that deals 1d6 fire damage/level.
Sneeze flame to set your enemies on fire and knock them prone.
Cloak yourself in flames that harm nearby enemies.
Spray a rushing stream of fire from your hand.
Smites foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).
Rolling ball of fire deals 3d6 fire damage.
Rolling ball of fire deals 6d6 fire damage and ignites targets.
Dazzles one creature (-1 on attack rolls).
As flare, but affects all creatures in 10 ft.
Cause smoky fires to spring up to burn foes and set them alight
Create an area of inconsistent lighting.
Creates 3-ft.-diameter horizontal disk that holds 100 lbs./level.
Cone-shaped blast of snowballs deals 4d6 cold damage.
Hook of force drags you to the target.
Target takes force damage and is pushed away.
Create a magical longsword made entirely of force.
Cube or cage of force imprisons all inside.
Strike a creature with great force, dealing extra damage and knocking it back.
Freezes water or deals cold damage.
Target takes cold damage and is staggered.
The area is covered in a chilling frost.
Hurl a warhammer of magically hardened ice at your target.
Conjure balls of flame to throw.
Light wind protects one target from clouds, gases, heat, and vapors.
Create a ghost touch whip that passes through objects.
Create a forked trident of electricity.
Hand provides cover, pushes, or grapples.
Blows away or knocks down smaller creatures.
Release a swirling ball of wind to move around and knock your enemies about.
Fire a ray to give someone heatstroke, dealing 1d4 non-lethal damage and inducing exhaustion.
Damn creatures to Hell with a blast of pure hellfire.
Ghostly hand leads subject to you.
As heroic fortune, but with multiple people.
Harms and possibly blinds evil creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).
Weapon becomes +5, deals +2d6 damage against evil.
Whisper sickens evil creatures, gives good creatures bonuses.
Kills, paralyzes, blinds, or deafens nongood subjects.
Create three notes heard miles away.
Create an area of massive darkness filled with unseen chewing teeth and ravenous maws.
Create a severe blast of air bursting out from you.
Wave of water bull rushes an enemy.
Creates torrent of water that bull rushes any creature in its path.
Coat an area with thin ice, dealing cold damage and causing creatures to fall prone.
Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.
Thick ice holds and damages the target.
As icy prison, but it affects 1 creature/level.
(Mass Combat Spell) Imbue an army with a special ability.
Transfer a hex to someone else, allowing them to make use of it.
As imbue with spell ability, except you transfer your elemental assault ability to the target.
Grapple incorporeal creatures and deal damage equal to 1d8 + Int.
You inflict a vengeful fate on a creature, dealing electricity damage each time it attacks or casts a spell.
You gain an additional effect while a judgment is active.
Target takes 1d6 sonic/level and is stunned.
Create a blade like mage's sword that focuses more on defense.
As Aroden's defending sword, but with multiple swords
Alter a creature's buoyancy so that it plummits to the depths
Target is restricted to a specific location.
Creates a soaring beacon of light.
Surround a creature with a light prison, damaging and blinding it if it attempts to escape.
Targets in a line take 1d6 electricity/level.
Create a cackling lash of unholy lightning.
Empowers bombs you throw with a ward that deals lightning damage each time those damaged by the bomb move more than 5 feet.
As sepia snake sigil, except using the Thassilonian schools of magic.
Weaken chaotic creatures against the attacks of lawful creatures
A single evil creature takes more damage from creatures with a good aura.
A single target is deafened until the condition is removed, and is confused for 1 round.
Send a message to creatures within miles.
1d4+1 damage; +1 missile per two levels above 1st (max 5).
As the combat maneuver version of telekinesis, with some additional changes
Four exploding spheres each deal 6d6 fire damage.
Molten metal splash weapon deals 2d6 fire damage plus ongoing damage.
Imbue ammunition with damaging silver light
Create a sphere that sheds sunlight
Create up to four motes that shed light or darkness.
Cause splitting headaches and an oversensitivity to light and darkness.
As mydriatic spontaneity, except it can affect multiple creatures.
Alter a creature's buoyancy to be neutral, granting them increased maneuverability
Create an immobile wall of tiny black blades.
Use the Path of Numbers to fire rays of elemental energy.
Harms and dazes chaotic creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).
As pain strike, but affects multiple creatures.
As produce flame, but shedding dimlight and increased damage vs plants
Call forth mighty winds to clear a path for you.
Target is staggered by a painful sound.
You may seize an object or manipulate it from afar.
Thrown pinecone deals 1d6 piercing damage/2 levels in a 10-ft.-radius
Expel a cone of poison from your mouth.
Ranged touch attack deals 1d6/level cold damage and 1d4 points of Dexterity drain.
Rays hit subjects with variety of effects.
Unholy energy damages good creatures that attack you and protects you from good attacks.
Shadow protects the target from light.
Erupting flames burn a target several times.
Restore charges to a technological item.
Immediate burst of force provides +1 deflection bonus to AC per 2 caster levels
Telekinetic force rips your target limb from limb
As rend body I, but more damage
As rend body I, but target is sickened for as long as it bleeds
As rend body III, but more damage and a greater chance of removing a limb
Force globe protects but traps one subject.
As light, but hampers Stealth checks
Imbues a projectile weapon to give its ammunition the ability to ricochet.
A stream of wind causes nonlethal damage and can knock down or push creatures.
Tornado-force winds knock creatures prone or from the air
Charge magical runes to an explosive degree.
Holy energy damages evil creatures that attack you and protects you from good attacks
Sanctify an area with holy power.
Prevent a corpse from becoming an undead.
Use a small vessel of force to scoop up liquid or small objects.
Ranged touch attack deals 4d6 fire damage, + 1 ray/four levels (max 3).
Winds block vision and deal 3d6 damage per round.
Send forth a wave a flames screaming with the agony of the damned
Ray deals 1d8/two levels damage (more against undead).
Harm and possibly slow lawful creatures.
Sonic vibration damages objects or crystalline creatures.
Create an area of electricity that dazes all those within.
Shield yourself with darkness, granting yourself total concealment.
Create a protective shield of sunlight.
Obscure the appearance of all creatures within the shifting shadows.
Ensare a creature with a silver cord, allowing you to predict its actions and keep you close together.
Deafens all within cone and deals 5d6 sonic damage.
Devastating yell deals 10d6 sonic damage; stuns creatures.
Affected creatures have their vision impaired
Scatter a rolling blast of rough rock and dirt throughout the area.
Create a giant symbol of wrath to forcibly repulse all nearby creatures.
Create a bright silver light that is harmful to those vulnerable to silver.
Hot wind does 4d6 damage, fatigues those damaged, and knocks creatures prone.
Emulate a paladin's power to smite undead.
Throw a conjured ball of snow at a target
Create a cone of damaging sound at will.
Sound moves targets away from you.
Deals 1d8 sonic damage and may stun subjects.
Harm and possibly blind evil creatures.
As lesser spellcasting contract, but grant higher level spells.
As spellcasting contract but with higher level spells.
Forge a contract to grant someone spellcasting abilities.
Give a weapon ghost touch and another ability tied to an emotion.
Creates a divine ally to aid you.
Create an ally out of force to assist you in combat
Magic weapon attacks on its own.
Target takes 3d6 points of fire damage and catches on fire.
Create a mobile area of bright light while also suppressing light surrounding it.
As scorching ray, but once per round and works underwater
Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 6d6 damage.
Infuse arcane power into an ioun stone to protect you from mental attacks.
Symbol creates stormwinds and lightning when triggered
As contingency, but invests a spell into one of your implements.
Create a whip made of sound that damages foes and can frighten animals
Launches an ally through the air.
Telekinetically hurl an object, dealing 1d6 points of damage to the target and object.
As resilient sphere, but you move the sphere telekinetically.
Deal 1d6 points of damage per level plus daze and stun in a 40-ft. radius.
Imbue a creature's limbs with force, adding damage to unarmed strikes
Fire raw elemental energy in a 30 ft. long line.
Cause someone to combust with a touch.
Gain a supernatural ability to detect tracks and other clues.
Temporarily grant control of your familiar to another creature.
Test a creature's purity of convictions by exposing it to a sheet of divine fire.
Cover the target creature in burning acid.
Your glowing body dazzles or blinds others.
Protective barrier of force knocks creatures and deals force damage
Harms and sickens good creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).
Weapon becomes +5, deals +2d6 damage vs. good.
Force a halo around a target, preventing it from hiding in the dark.
Conjure a small cloud of burning ash in the target's face.
Create a group of orbiting comets that can immediately strike those who target you with spells.
Cause a firearm to misfire and explode
As per violent misfire, but 1 target/level
As fire shield, except acid damage.
Magical trail aids good creatures, hinders evil ones.
Wall of spirits blocks movement on Material Plane and Ethereal Plane and causes fear.
Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 damage +1/level.
Ice plane creates wall or hemisphere creates dome.
Create a wall of blinding light.
Sonic wall deflects and damages creatures.
Create a wall of illumination, darkness on one side, light on the other.
Surround yourself with a protective spout of acid.
Cyclone deals damage and can pick up creatures.
Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.
Gives you the ability to fly and attack with wind.
Kills, confuses, stuns, or deafens nonchaotic subjects.
Subject shines and gets +1/four levels on all saves.
Threats seem like a ridiculous farce.
As disguise self, but you can change the disguise as a swift action.
Force your attacker to suffer mental pain when harming you.
Creatures believe you are their direct superior.
Make one instrument sound like a different kind of instrument.
As appearance of life, but deceiveing all of the senses
Cloak yourself in a phantasm that ellicits certain emotions from observing creatures
Create a phantasm with auditory and visual effects.
Create a phantasm with auditory effects.
Masks a creature's or an object's alignment, emotion, health, and magic auras.
Mutate someone's shadow and trick the creature into believing they've transformed.
Change the color of yourself to match your surroundings and gain a bonus to Stealth.
Change the appearance of a creature to better blend in with its surroundings.
Attacks miss subject 20% of the time.
As blur, but only while you are moving.
Change one creature to look and act like another.
Skull acts as magic mouth, listeners are shaken.
Gives a +4 bonus on Stealth checks and concealment.
As chameleon stride, but affecting all nearby creatures.
Create an area of semi-real gore
Make yourself heard over great distances.
Filter speech from a given area to sound like a different conversation.
Shadows protect you from bright light and grants defensive abilities
Knocks unconscious, blinds, and/or stuns weak creatures.
Create a phantasm with effects for all senses.
As create mindscape, but affecting more creatures, having a longer duration, and allowing magic alteration.
Summon a duplicate of yourself to provoke enemy attacks of opportunity.
Make a weapon appear dazzingly shiny, making it easier to disarm and feint in combat.
As dazzling blade, except with multiple weapons.
Make someone seem like an obvious liar.
Protect your magic from attempts to dispel it
Target enemies as nightmare or fellow worshipers of Lamashtu as dream
Call forth spectral Hellknights to trample targets in your path
As disguise self, but affects you or another.
Attacks miss subject 50% of the time.
Create an illusion to repulse a vampire.
Surroundings and unfamiliar creatures seem like something out of a nightmare.
Create a phantasm that leeches onto the psyche of a nearby creature.
Cause a creature to think it is dreaming
Cause a sound to repeat itself
Instrument maintains bardic performance for you.
Summon a shadowy version of a legendary character.
Cause divinations of the future to reveal the result you choose.
As false vision, but moves with the target.
As project image, but the image follows your familiar.
Create an illusory duplicate of your familiar to fool enemies.
Create a menacing duplicate of yourself to interact with others.
Disguise copper pieces or silver pieces as gold pieces
Become invisible, but appear as if you used teleportation magic to escape.
Leave a message hidden on a surface
You look like a ghost of yourself.
Change the appearance of a structure to suit your tastes
Makes one type of terrain appear like another (field as forest, or the like).
You surround yourself with disturbing illusions.
Creatures are shaken and take Wis damage.
Disguise a creature's injuries, making them more difficult to heal
Hides all traces of your campsite.
You appear to be standing still, even when you take some actions.
Make it seem like another is responsible for your attacks.
Make it seem like another is responsible for your attacks while concealing your own actions.
Create an illusion of a stationary group of people milling about.
Force the target to believe nothing in its hoard is missing or disturbed.
Create an illusion of an ever-changing maze of glass.
Create a phantasmal poison on a weapon.
Only select creatures can read text.
Wall, floor, or ceiling looks real, but anything can pass through.
Instill false psychic impressions into an object.
Summon illusory wasps to distract creatures
Create illusory pillars that block movement
Ignore divine focus components of your spells.
Provide a short-term replica of an object.
Start a psychic duel between yourself and another creature.
Subject is invisible for 1 min./level or until it attacks.
As invisibility, but altered to work better underwater
As invisibility bubble, but capable of affecting larger creatures
As invisibility bubble, but affecting all creatures within range
As invisibility, but subject can attack and stay invisible.
As invisibility, but affects all in range.
Make a creature invisible and silent to their allies.
Force a creature to become jittery, taking a penalty on Dexterity-related checks and being unable to delay, ready, or take a total defense action.
As sepia snake sigil, except using the Thassilonian schools of magic.
Obscure a target's tracks when fleeing from a pursuer.
Target takes penalties to mental actions.
As magic aura, but also affects creatures and allows more options.
As silent image, plus sound, smell, and thermal effects.
As major creation except the object created is a semi-real illusion.
Send spectres of crippling doubt into those who would attack you.
Hides presence of a spell from detect magic.
As mask dweomer, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
Trap creatures in a veiled mindscape permanently, causing their bodies to waste away in the real world.
Create a portal allowing entry to and exit from a mindscape.
As the dream spell, except delivering a shorter message.
As silent image, plus some sound.
As minor creation, except the object created is a semi-real illusion.
Creates decoy duplicates of you (1d4 + 1 per three levels, max 8).
Creature sees an looming assassin whenever they see their reflection in a mirror
Misleads divinations for one creature or object.
Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.
Allies gain a bonus on Stealth checks but risk verbal spell failure.
Targeted creature may not positively influence anyone.
Disturb a creature's rest with dark dreams
Cloak yourself in an illusion that hides your true identity
Make the text on a page more difficult to decipher
Distract and fatigue the target with a creature from its nightmares.
As oneiric horror, plus Str damage.
Obfuscate whether a door is open or closed.
Target becomes hostile to all creatures.
Conceal the alignment of creatures from divination magic.

This spell functions like silent image, except that the figment includes visual, auditory, olfactory, and thermal elements, and the spell is permanent. By concentrating, you can move the image within the limits of the range, but it is static while you are not concentrating.
As major image, but no concentration required.
Convince a target hat it contracted an affliction.
Trick a creature into thinking it can't breathe.
Fearsome illusion kills subject or deals 3d6 damage.
Trick a creature into thinking their flesh is rotting.
Creature re-lives an injury, taking 1d6 damage/level
Temporarily suppress an affliction or condition.
Project a current image of the nighty sky in places you would normally be unable to view it.
As major image, plus triggered by event.
Illusory double can talk and cast spells.
Perform a lengthy mental task in a private mindscape.
Create a perfect illusion of yourself that is incorporeal and capable of casting psychic spells, and switch between it and your body at will.
Weapons make no sound and quiet their victims.
Mask any flaws of or damage to a creature or object.
Cloak yourself in an illusion of authority.
Render all targets silent, but only one-way.
Twisting colors confuse, stun, or render unconscious.
Create a wall that fascinates creatures that attempt to move through it
Illusion hides area from vision and scrying.
As complex hallucination, but without concentration.
Shadows search for a creature or object in range
Invisibly inscribe a small mark or message on a creature or obejct.
Changes appearance of one person per two levels.
Allow one creature to see you while invisible.
Disguise a construct as a creature of flesh.
As shadow conjuration, but up to 8th level and 80% real.
Tether a creature to its shadow, preventing it from moving too far.
Create a vicious spiked chain enshrouded in shadow.
Claws of shadow deal slashing damage and Strength damage
Mimics conjuration below 4th level, but only 20% real.
As shadow conjuration, but up to 6th level and 60% real.
Shroud yourself in a shadowy illusion of a dragon.
Use material from the Shadow Plane to create an illusory version of an enchantment spell.
As shadow enchantment, except with higher level enchantments.
Conjure protective wisps of darkness made from shadow.
Mimics evocation of lower than 5th level, but only 20% real.
As shadow evocation, but up to 7th level and 60% real.
Teleport, leaving an illusion of yourself in the space you left
Teleport from one shadow to another.
Alter a creature's body with energy from the Shadow Plane, altering its form to match a shadow creature.
As shadow transmutation, but it mimics greater polymorph instead of polymorph.
Pin someone's shadow, causing them to become stuck.
Step into shadow to travel rapidly.
Shadowy duplicate starts a bardic performance.
Become invisibile to creatures using darkvision
Replace the target's body with mystic shadow material, causing them to take less damage from attacks.
Force a target to see more darkness around them.
Make a target sound as if elsewhere.
As mirror image, but the duplicates emit electrical damage when destroyed.
Creates minor illusion of your design.
Give yourself privacy by muffling sound leaving the area.
Illusory silt hides creatures while underwater
Creates partially real double of a creature.
Creates a double of a weak creature.
Convince yourself that something is an illusion, granting you the ability to ignore its actual presence.
As symbol of death, but fills a 5-foot square.
As magic aura, but affects all similar objects in a 5-foot radius
Creature moves at half speed, takes penalties, and has trouble casting spells.
As synesthesia, but affecting multiple creatures.
Prevent all forms of telepathy in the area
Replace surface thoughts with a mental echo.
Cause a rose to leave a scented trail along your path as you move.
As scripted hallucination, but it only appears when triggered.
Create a simulacrum of yourself out of cloth and twine.
Create a shadowy afterimage that can damage enemies if the initial attack misses.
Make a trap extremely difficult to find.
Make a single container appear empty.
Changes appearance of group of creatures.
Make an area seem worthless to others.
As nightmare, but can deliver a second spell when the target awakens.
Creatures that pass through the wall are nauseated and might fall prone.
Outlines subject and produces light as a sunrod.
As phantasmal killer, but affects all within 30 ft.
You become immune to diseases and toxins, absorb one, and then spread it to others.
Channel a fell curse through your gaze.
Force the target to contract an advanced form of scurvy.
Store a copy of your body in the Akashic Record, and restore yourself to that form upon your death.
Projects you and companions onto Astral Plane.
Sap the strength of those around you.
Creatures in your aura become shaken.
Cone deals 1d4 per level and panics creatures.
Fog obscures the vision of others and extends the range of your hexes.
Allow the enchanted to sleep comfortably in medium or heavy armor.
Use the restless dead to down your targets
-6 to an ability score; -4 on attack rolls, saves, and checks; or 50% chance of losing each action.
Place an even greater curse on the subject.
Mark someone which makes them afraid of water and turns aquatic creatures against them.
Inflict a specific and feared pirate curse onto your target.
Enchant a weapon to deal extra bleed damage.
Cause a stabilized creature to resume dying.
Increase the cost to use mythic power.
Enhance a weapon to deal bleed damage with its attack.
Withers one plant or deals 1d6/level damage to plant creature.
Kill a weak creature and turn its corpse into an explosive trap.
Boil the blood of your enemies, dealing constitution damage and causing fatigue.
Enhance those with a blood frenzy.
Cause someone to bleed from every orifice; drinking this blood will heal your wounds.
Create writhing tentacles from your chest.
When a target is harmed, so is the target's relative.
Cause yourself and enemies to bleed.
Swear an oath, damaging yourself to gain a bonus to things relating to that oath.
Enhance ranged weaponry to deal bleed damage.
Gives creature the ability to deal bleed damage with natural attacks.
Become more intimidating with black eyes that weep blood and turn your teeth into jagged fangs.
Gain armor spikes which provide +1 natural armor and a +2 damage with natural weapons.
Momentarily control a living or undead creature's skeleton.
Create fractures and splinters in the bones/carapace of a creature.
Slashing weapon deals bleed damage to an opponent's head.
Cause the target's attacks to gain a miss chance.
Postpone hostile action by a haunt or incorporeal undead.
Eviscerate a target, creating an advanced mummy from its life essence.
Make a willing target appear to be dead.
One creature of 5 HD or less flees for 1d4 rounds.
One touch/level deals 1d6 damage and possibly 1 Str damage.
Sense whenever your companion is wounded and call out to it in a time of need.
Bestow a curse that is difficult to remove without fulfilling the condition.
Infect a subject with a magical disease.
As languid venom, but with a triggering condition.
Undead don't attack you while under your command.
Create a sickly version of dancing lights.
Create a poltergeist to disrupt crafting and spellcasting
Create shadows, wraiths, spectres, or devourers.
Draw a recently dead creature's soul into a gem.
Create ghasts, ghouls, mohrgs, or mummies.
Create a bog mummy, ice mummy, or Osirian tomb guardian.
Curse an object to make it flawed and prone to failure.
Target can't gain the benefit of any luck ability.
Curse a creature with a chance of instant and unexpected death.
Curse an area with four hazards
Curse an area with six dangerous hazards
Curse an area with three mild hazards
Curse an area with seven deadly hazards
As bestow curse, but harder to remove.
Plants die, living creatures catch diseases, or dead creatures rise as zombies.
Target object curses the next creature to touch it
As death ward, but against daemons.
Reshape an undead creature to appear living.
Your might increases with every kill you make.
Create a howling fire elemental from the remains of the target's life energy.
Kills dying creature; you gain 1d8 temporary hp, +2 to Str, and +1 caster level.
Create an aura that feeds on the souls of those who die within it.
As death knell aura, except dying creatures die much faster within the aura.
Grants bonuses against death spells and negative energy.
Prevent death from hit point damage so long as this spell persists.
Reveals how near death subjects within 30 ft. are.
Turn a potion into a pool of necromantic energy.
